Detailed Description

This class implements the Unscented Kalman Filter (first version: needs to be tested).

The system is defined by the two equations:

  • System (prediction) non-linear equation:

    with:

  • Observation (measurement) non-linear equation:

    with:

[in]state_dimstate dimension
[in]obs_dimobservation dimension

[in]init_estimation_cov_matrixinitial estimation covariance matrix (P0)
[in]prediction_noise_cov_matrixprediction noise covariance matrix (Q)
[in]observation_noise_cov_matrixobservation noise covariance matrix (R)
[in]augmented_process_noiseadd the process noise in the augmented state (false by default)
[in]augmented_observation_noiseadd the observation noise in the augmented state (false by default)

Parameters
[in]stateThe current state vector. Its size is already set to state dimension.
[out]expected_observationThe vector to be filled with the expected observation. Its size is already set to observation dimension.
